name: Music_958.wav
keywords: ['latin pop', 'male voice', 'slow dance song', 'bass', 'percussion', 'piano', 'brass section', 'romantic mood', 'claves']
caption: This Latin pop song features a male voice singing the main melody. The voice sings at a high pitch. This is accompanied by Latin style percussion. A variety of percussion is used including the claves and cowbell. The bass plays a groovy bassline. The piano plays chords with a Latin feel. The brass section plays fills in between lines. This song has a romantic mood. This song can be played in a party for a slow dance.
